Package at.fhhagenberg.sqe.elevator.controller

Interface IElevatorController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElevatorControllerImpl
    public interface IElevatorController
    Controller interface for sending commands to the elevator(s).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  IElevatorController.ControllerInvalidDoorStateException
      Exception to be thrown when receiving an invalid door state.
      static class  IElevatorController.ControllerInvalidElevatorDirectionException
      Exception to be thrown when receiving an invalid elevator direction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void fillModel()
      Pulls values from the elevator interface and stores them into the model objects.
      IBuildingModel getBuilding()  
      void maintainConnection()
      Try to restore a failsafe state after loosing connection.
      void setAutomaticMode​(int elevatorNumber, boolean mode)
      Disables or enables automatic mode for a given elevator.
      void setCommittedDirection​(int elevatorNumber, int direction)
      Sets the committed direction of the specified elevator (up / down / uncommitted).
      void setServicesFloors​(int elevatorNumber, int floor, boolean service)
      Sets whether or not the specified elevator will service the specified floor (yes/no).
      void setTarget​(int elevatorNumber, int target)
      Sets the floor target of the specified elevator.

    • Method Detail

      • setCommittedDirection

        void setCommittedDirection​(int elevatorNumber,
                           int direction)
        Sets the committed direction of the specified elevator (up / down / uncommitted).
        Parameters:
        elevatorNumber - elevator number whose committed direction is being set
        direction - direction being set where up=0, down=1 and uncommitted=2

      • setServicesFloors

        void setServicesFloors​(int elevatorNumber,
                       int floor,
                       boolean service)
        Sets whether or not the specified elevator will service the specified floor (yes/no).
        Parameters:
        elevatorNumber - elevator number whose service is being defined
        floor - floor whose service by the specified elevator is being set
        service - indicates whether the floor is serviced by the specified elevator (yes=true,no=false)

      • setTarget

        void setTarget​(int elevatorNumber,
               int target)
        Sets the floor target of the specified elevator.
        Parameters:
        elevatorNumber - elevator number whose target floor is being set
        target - floor number which the specified elevator is to target

      • setAutomaticMode

        void setAutomaticMode​(int elevatorNumber,
                      boolean mode)
        Disables or enables automatic mode for a given elevator.
        Parameters:
        elevatorNumber - elevator number to change the mode for.
        mode - true for automatic mode false otherwise.

      • maintainConnection

        void maintainConnection()
        Try to restore a failsafe state after loosing connection.

      • fillModel

        void fillModel()
        Pulls values from the elevator interface and stores them into the model objects.

      • getBuilding

        IBuildingModel getBuilding()
        Returns:
        Building which is controlled by this controller.
